Participants will receive:

- Industry Training Certificate (upon assessment completion)
- Experience Certificate from Cloud Counselage (on successful completion)
- Appreciation letter/certificate (top performers)

Cloud Computing, Digital Marketing, DevOps, Human Resources, Machine Learning, Data Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, Business Research, Web Development, Java, Python, Business Development, React JS, UI/UX, Node.js, Operations Management, Android Development, Quality Assurance, Flutter, Cyber Security, Product Management, Project Management, Game Development, Blockchain, Full Stack Development, Marketing Management

Industry-Academia Community (IAC) provides 360-degree professional development and career growth opportunities for students and freshers.

queries.query: benefits of being part of IAC
queries.response: IAC offers workshops, career vision, guidance, industry training, internships, industry visits, CV preparation, soft skills, assessments, hackathons, placements, and entrepreneurship program.

queries.query: fees for being part of community
queries.response: Being part of IAC is absolutely FREE, with no hidden charges.
You can choose activities as per your preference, but participating in more enhances your career readiness.
You're expected to spend 1-2 hours weekly for professional development under IAC.
Yes, activities are designed with flexibility to accommodate academic commitments.
More than 90% of members rated their experience positively, with boosted confidence, better interviews, and placements.

queries.query: how will the internship be conducted
queries.response: The 6-12 weeks online internship focuses on one domain, with no interviews or aptitude tests. Successful project submission earns experience certificate.

queries.query: how will the internship be evaluated
queries.response: Interns will be evaluated based on project completion, quality of deliverables, and adherence to deadlines.

queries.query: how to prepare for the internship
queries.response: Prepare by reviewing domain-specific concepts, brushing up on relevant skills, and familiarizing yourself with the internship structure.

queries.query: are there any rewards for top performers
queries.response: Yes, top performers receive appreciation letters, certificates, and special recognition through the Industry Academia Excellence Awards.

queries.query: what is the age group for the internship
queries.response: The internship is open to students aged 17 to 24 who aspire to careers in IT and Management.

queries.query: is there a cost for the internship
queries.response: No, the internship and all Industry Academia Community activities are completely free of cost.
